vtta-tokenizer.reset-settings.name: Reset Settings
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-npc.name: Default NPC frame (hostile NPC's)
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-npc.hint: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-neutral.hin: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-pc.name: Default Player Character frame
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-pc.hint: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.name: Default Tint Frame
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.hint: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default tint frame.
vtta-tokenizer.frame-tint.name: Frame tint mode?
vtta-tokenizer.frame-tint.hint: If selected, a neutral frame will be applied, then a tint colour applied to it
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.pc: Default frame tint color for PC's
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.friend: Default frame tint color for friendly NPC's
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.neutra: Default frame tint color for neutral NPC's
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-tint.hostil: Default frame tint color for hostile NPC's
vtta-tokenizer.image-upload-directory.hi: The avatar and token upload location on the server, relative to the Foundry/Data directory.
vtta-tokenizer.npc-image-upload-director: NPC image upload directory for NPC tokens
The avatar and token upload location on the server, relative to the Foundry/Data directory.
vtta-tokenizer.frame-directory.name: Directory for custom token frames
vtta-tokenizer.frame-directory.hint: The location on the server to look for frame images.
vtta-tokenizer.add-frame-default.name: Add a frame to the token when opened
vtta-tokenizer.add-frame-default.hint: If selected, Tokenizer will add the default frame to the token when it's opened.
vtta-tokenizer.image-save-type.name: Image File Type
vtta-tokenizer.image-save-type.hint: The avatar and token images will be saved in this format. webp is preferred as it produces smaller file sizes on average.
vtta-tokenizer.token-size.name: Token size
vtta-tokenizer.token-size.hint: Specifies the token size (width and height). A value higher than 200 is recommended.
vtta-tokenizer.portrait-size.name: Portrait size
vtta-tokenizer.portrait-size.hint: Specifies the portrait size (width and height). A value higher than 200 is recommended.
vtta-tokenizer.requires-upload-permissio: Tokenizer requires the permission to Upload Files. Please inform your Gamemaster.
vtta-tokenizer.title-link.name: Title bar link?
vtta-tokenizer.title-link.hint: Place the tokenizer link in the title bar?
vtta-tokenizer.enable-default-texture-la: If enabled applies a default texture/image to under the token image, but above any default color layer.
vtta-tokenizer.default-texture-layer-tin: Color tint for default texture layer
Will apply this color to the default texture layer as a tint, if empty no tinting will take place
vtta-tokenizer.default-color.name: Default background colour for token?
vtta-tokenizer.default-color-layer.name: Add a color layer by default?
vtta-tokenizer.log-level.name: Log level
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click.name: Disable avatar click (global default)
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click.hint: Don't open Tokenizer when avatar picture is clicked. (Shift click will still open Tokenizer).
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click-user: Don't open Tokenizer when avatar picture is clicked. (Shift click will still open Tokenizer).
vtta-tokenizer.token-only-toggle.name: Token only edit?
vtta-tokenizer.token-only-toggle.hint: When opening tokenizer, only modify the token, not the avatar by default.
vtta-tokenizer.disable-omfg-frames.name: Disable OMFG frames
vtta-tokenizer.disable-jcolson-frames.na: Disable JColson Token Frames module integration
vtta-tokenizer.label.UseFoundry: Use an image from Foundry Server
vtta-tokenizer.label.UseFoundryTokenVari: Use an image from Foundry Server through TokenVariants
vtta-tokenizer.label.ToggleBasicMask: Toggle basic mask for this layer
vtta-tokenizer.label.EditLayerTint: Edit the tint color applied to this layer
vtta-tokenizer.label.MagicLasso: Use the Magic Lasso to select an area to change?
vtta-tokenizer.label.ColorChangeControl: Make a color or similar area on a layer transparent
vtta-tokenizer.label.ResetColorTranspare: Reset color/transparency changes on this layer
vtta-tokenizer.label.LayerMovementContro: Layer movement controls - flip, centre, reset
vtta-tokenizer.reset-custom-frames.name: Reset Custom Frames?
vtta-tokenizer.masks-directory.name: Directory for custom masks
vtta-tokenizer.masks-directory.hint: The location on the server to look for mask images.
vtta-tokenizer.reset-custom-masks.name: Reset Custom Masks?
vtta-tokenizer.add-mask-default.name: Add a mask to the token when opened
vtta-tokenizer.add-mask-default.hint: If selected, Tokenizer will add the default mask to the token when it's opened.
vtta-tokenizer.default-mask-layer.name: Image for default mask layer
vtta-tokenizer.default-token-offset.name: Default Token Offset
vtta-tokenizer.default-token-offset.hint: When auto applying a frame, how many pixels to offset image by. Will be auto scaled to match.
vtta-tokenizer.default-algorithm.name: Use Ray Algorithm for mask detection?
vtta-tokenizer.default-crop-image.name: Crop Images?
vtta-tokenizer.default-crop-image.hint: Images are automatically cropped to fit the shortest side and centred. This is useful in some auto-tokenize situations, but is probably not needed day-to-day.
vtta-tokenizer.apply-prototype-to-scene: Apply Prototype Token Image to Scene Tokens
vtta-tokenizer.disable-player.name: Disable for Users lacking permissions?
vtta-tokenizer.disable-player.hint: If the user doesn't have FILE UPLOAD permissions, completely disable tokenizer for them.
vtta-tokenizer.auto.description: Tokenize all ({length}) actors in this compendium {packName}?
vtta-tokenizer.CustomMaskEditor.title: Custom Mask Editor
vtta-tokenizer.CustomMaskEditor.add: Add to the mask with the left mouse button, and remove holding shift.
vtta-tokenizer.CustomMaskEditor.remove: Remove from the mask, use the right mouse or hold shift with the left mouse button.
vtta-tokenizer.CustomMaskEditor.brush: Use the mouse wheel to increase/decrease brush size.
vtta-tokenizer.notification.failedInput: Failed to load original image "{url}". File has possibly been deleted. Falling back to default.
vtta-tokenizer.notification.failedLoad: Failed to load token: "{imgSrc}", falling back to "{default}"
vtta-tokenizer.download.url: Please provide the URL of your desired image
vtta-tokenizer.MagicLasso.title: Magic Lasso Mode!
vtta-tokenizer.MagicLasso.description: Click to select an area. Hold left mouse button to change the color matching threshold. Hold CTRL to add to selection.

vtta-tokenizer.quick-settings.label: Quick Settings Selector
vtta-tokenizer.quick-settings.description: Quickly apply changes for the type of tokens you wish to make. This will use the currently selected default image for the frame, texture layer, colours etc.

tokenring-colour.label: Token Ring Colour
tokenring-colour.description: A token ring with a solid background colour

tokenring-texture.label: Token Ring Texture
tokenring-texture.description: A token ring with a texture layer as background

tokenring-transparent.label: Token Ring Clear
tokenring-transparent.description: A token ring with no background

dynamicring.label: Dynamic Token Ring
dynamicring.description: Use the dynamic ring mask, no background colour

nothing.label: Nothing
nothing.description: No ring, mask or background colour

vtta-tokenizer.auto-apply-dynamic-token-: Automatically enable dyanmic token ring on edited tokens?
